about.title: About Me
about.label: About
about.description1: I am a web developer with 3+ years of experience creating digital solutions that make a difference. I have proficiency in modern web technologies and a keen eye for design and user experience.
about.description2: I work on developing efficient and functional interfaces, as well as business logic and backend development, always striving for clean, scalable, and optimized code.

services.subtitle: I offer a range of services to help bring your digital vision to life
services.label: Services
services.description: From concept to delivery, I turn ideas into complete digital experiences, combining design, code, and infrastructure to create products that truly work and delight.

experience.label: Experience
experience.title: Where I Worked
experience.subtitle: My professional and academic journey so far

facilize.description: Vision and technical leadership of Facilize, an integrated SaaS platform (ERP/CRM) for service providers. Developed multi-account financial management, appointment engines with public portals, B2B/B2C CRM, staff commission flows, and automated tax calculators.

senai.description: Worked on multiple projects with Golang, Next.js, Nest.js, and PostgreSQL. Developed APIs, fixed bugs, modeled databases, and deployed to AWS/Docker in an Agile SCRUM environment.

freelance.description: Delivered full-stack solutions using TypeScript, Nest.js, Express, Next.js, Angular, and Docker. Designed and implemented robust APIs with PostgreSQL and MongoDB.

ucsal.description: Systems Analysis and Development focused on software engineering and application architecture.

senaiEdu.description: Technical education focused on web development, programming logic, and databases.
